sentences.english: I screamed in pain as the knife cut the surface layer of my skin.
sentences.chinese: 我的皮膚被割開了，我痛苦的嘶叫着。

sentences.english: Premium solvent, odourless and no harmful to skin.
sentences.chinese: 優質溶劑，無氣味，不傷皮膚。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical characteristics and treatment options of cutaneous vessel abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結兒童皮膚脈管異常的臨牀特點和治療選擇。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to diagnose and discuss the etiologies of vesicular and bullous skin lesions.
sentences.chinese: 學習診斷及探討水皰及大皰皮膚病變之病因。

sentences.english: Can run- of -mill skin contusion use gentian violet?
sentences.chinese: 一般性皮膚挫傷能不能用紫藥水？

sentences.english: Their skins also contain many glands, which also lose water.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚也布有許多皮腺，會流失許多水分。

sentences.english: Recommended for all non-sensitive skin types.
sentences.chinese: 各種皮膚，敏感皮膚不建議使用。

sentences.english: Tritium emits a weak form of radiation that does not travel very far in the air and cannot penetrate the skin.
sentences.chinese: 氚發出的輻射很弱，在空氣傳播不遠，不能穿透皮膚。

sentences.english: Dirt, bacteria, and makeup left on overnight can irritate skin, clog pores, and trigger breakouts.
sentences.chinese: 超過一夜的灰塵，細菌和化妝刺激皮膚，堵塞毛孔。

sentences.english: Yet, this addresses only one, the outer side of the skin .
sentences.chinese: 然而，這隻作用於一處，皮膚的外部。
